name: Color Overflow
description:
This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam 107.

Escape from your own shadow! It will retrace all of your steps, and if you're not fast enough, it might just catch up to you! Slash your way through countless colorful enemies, and kill enough of them to reach the goal and unlock the exit of the stage! You don't have to kill them all, but  it's not like they can complain when their torso and belly are several feet apart, *wink wink*. 

Controls: 

[A] and [D] to move around

[K] while standing, running or jumping to attack

[J] or [SPACE} to Jump

[R] to quickly restart the level
